channel.title: Welcome on Richard Klein
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome on Richard Klein

item.title: First Post
item.description: Trying out a new webpage design. This is built in the ‘blogdown’ R package, uploaded to a GitHub repo, then served to web with Netlify. Credit to the Hugo Tranquilpeak theme. One advantage is that we can write in simple R Markdown, and embed+run R code easily: mean(cars$speed) ## [1] 15.4 fit <- lm(dist ~ speed, data = cars) fit ## ## Call: ## lm(formula = dist ~ speed, data = cars) ## ## Coefficients: ## (Intercept) speed ## -17.
